name: serverless-githubwebhook
description: - Install npm ``` $ sudo apt install npm ``` - Install serverless framework ``` $ npm install serverless -g ``` - Install App dependencies ``` $ npm install ``` - Install python3-pip (curl is used to check URL state) ``` sudo apt install python3-pip curl -y ``` - App Deployment ```  $ serverless deploy ```
author: atcsecure
